header.name: Konstantinos Lathyris
header.title: Industrial Operations Manager | IoT & Digital Tech Specialist

cv.summaryText: Experienced technical professional with 25+ years of experience in asphalt plant operations and heavy equipment operation. Specialized in production management, equipment maintenance, and process optimization. I possess a unique profile that combines hands-on knowledge of heavy machinery and electrical installations with advanced digital skills in Programming (Python), Networks, and Product Design (3D Printing / CAD).
cv.summaryText2: I focus on modernizing production processes through IoT and automation. Additionally, I manage self-hosted infrastructure with Proxmox and Docker containers for data logging and predictive maintenance. My personal projects (programming, design, 3D printing, smart home) are developed using artificial intelligence for efficient workflows and innovation.

flame.title: Flame
flame.description: Personal homepage and dashboard running in Docker container on Debian VM within Proxmox home lab server. Provides a modern and customizable interface for managing bookmarks and links.

proxmox.title: Proxmox Home Lab Server
proxmox.description: Proxmox VE virtualization platform for home lab environment. Provides full virtualization capabilities with support for containers and VMs, ideal for testing and development.

portainer.title: Portainer - Docker Management
portainer.description: Portainer container management platform running in Docker on Debian VM. Provides web-based UI for managing Docker containers, images, volumes and networks.

mailExtractor.title: MailExtractor
mailExtractor.description: Windows application for extracting data from Gmail. Users download an .mbox file from Google Takeout (takeout.google.com), decompress it within the application, select it, and the application automatically extracts names, email addresses, and phone numbers to Excel. Features free use initially, then requires a machine-specific key that corresponds to the specific machine running the application.

myInventory.title: MyInventory
myInventory.description: A Flutter mobile application for basic warehouse management, developed from the need for warehouse management at work. The application provides a complete warehouse management solution with multi-warehouse support, product management, stock transfers between warehouses, low stock alerts, backup & restore functionality, and AI Assistant with Google Gemini API integration. Ideal for anyone who needs effective and simple warehouse management.

countdownTimer.title: Countdown Timer
countdownTimer.description: My first Python desktop application - a simple yet effective countdown timer with built-in notifications and audio playback. When the timer completes, the application displays a notification and automatically plays music files from the same directory. Ideal for time management, Pomodoro technique, and personal productivity.

pdfToMp3.title: PDF to MP3 Converter
pdfToMp3.description: Python desktop application that converts PDF files to MP3 audio files, enabling audio consumption of content during other activities such as exercise, running, or daily tasks. Developed out of necessity and personal satisfaction to improve learning efficiency and better utilize available time. Ideal for continuous learning and multitasking.
